title: Old Video Resurfaces as Cop Being Thrashed by BJP Leader’s Son
subtitle: Fact Check: A viral video on social media claims that Andhra Pradesh’s sub-inspector was beaten by BJP leader’s son for checking his car. He is actually a forest police officer who was stopping the six men from drinking alcohol.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Secondly, the viral message claims that the alleged sub-inspector was beaten for checking the car of BJP leader’s son. However, it’s not true. He was assaulted by the ‘goons’ as he had reportedly stopped them from drinking alcohol in the forest area.

As for the man supposedly being a BJP leader’s son, this claim too has proven to be false. When the police apprehended the six persons involved in the incident, one of them alleged that he was related to former Telangana Congress MLC Ranga Reddy. However, speaking to Mirror Now, Reddy dismissed these claims and insisted that strict action be taken against the culprits.
